alert.note: Alert for Beaver (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 10 at 5:14PM CDT until further notice by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Cimarron River at Forgan 8N affecting Beaver County. Beaver River at Beaver affecting Beaver County. For the Cimarron River...including Kenton 2NE, Forgan 8N...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Beaver River at Beaver. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Minor overbank flooding of farm and ranch land occurs. No significant damage expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:00 PM CDT Monday the stage was 8.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 6.5 feet Friday evening. - Action stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued at 12 PM CDT. Tuesday afternoon at 1200 PM CDT.
